mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_order (order_sn, user_id, product_id, total_amount, status, create_time) VALUES (#{orderSn}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_sn, user_id, product_id, total_amount, status, create_time FROM oms_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
